name: everychord.io
description: - This app will display a piano and chords. You can : - play the piano and get the chords you're currently playing - search for a chord using the Interactive chord wheel

scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others "cd client && npm start" "cd server && npm start"
scripts.postinstall: npm run install:client && npm run install:server

author: Nathan Oliveira Da Silva
